title: DeepSea MOT: A benchmark dataset for multi-object tracking on deep-sea video
summary: This study introduces DeepSea MOT, a novel benchmark video dataset developed to evaluate the performance of multi-object tracking and object detection models in deep-sea environments. It facilitates consistent comparisons and aids in optimizing model performance for this specific contextual application.
usefulness_reason: The paper explicitly discusses the development of a "benchmark video dataset" for a specific context (deep-sea video), making it highly relevant to the concept of a "Contextual dataset." It focuses on a dataset designed for a particular application and its contextual use.
